ValidationRule.description: SS: Rule place to control PSG Alts Contacts, which is only allowed by PSG ALT group and they should not able to edit other Contact Types.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( AND ($Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator', OR ( AND ($Profile.Name <> 'PSG ALTS', PSG_Alts_Contacts__c = TRUE), AND ($Profile.Name = 'PSG ALTS',PSG_Alts_Contacts__c = FALSE)) ), TRUE, FALSE )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You DO NOT have privilege to modify this Contact record. Please contact your Administrator for further details.
